Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified SAML assertion identifier, nonce, and key length.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Pass the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A> property of a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> to this constructor.
The `derivationNonce` and `derivationLength` parameters are ignored when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause> class is serialized into an outgoing SOAP message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Matches(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause clause) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified key identifier is the same as the current instance.
Docs.returns: when the specified key identifier is the same as the current instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.Matches%2A> overload returns a value of `true` when either of the following is `true`:
- The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.AssertionId%2A> property of the `keyIdentifierClause` parameter has the same value as the current instance's <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.AssertionId%2A> property.
- The `keyIdentifierClause` parameter and this instance are the same instance.
